text: North Thetford is an unincorporated village in the town of Thetford, Orange County, Vermont, United States. The community is located along the Connecticut River and U.S. Route 5 north-northeast of Hanover, New Hampshire. North Thetford has a post office with ZIP code 05054. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Orange County, Vermont Category:Unincorporated communities in Vermont
title: North Thetford, Vermont
